flawed_nl_solution:
The salesman sold 17 bags for 17 bags x $18/bag = $<<17*18=306>>306
He sold 10 more for 10 bags x $25/bag = $<<10*25=250>>250
Thus far he has sold 17 bags + 10 bags = <<17+10=24>>24 bags
Therefore he sold 48 bags - 24 bags = <<48-24=24>>24 bags for $22 each
24 bags were sold for 24 bags x $22/bag = $<<24*22=528>>528
In total the salesman made $306 + $250 + $528 = $<<306+250+528=1084>>1084
The salesman made $1084 - $576 = $<<1084-576=508>>508 in profit.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 27, not 24. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
